this_title: Don’t Go in That House, Bitch
introduction: Don’t Go in That House, Bitch takes a page out of the playbook of Edgar Wright’s Grindhouse trailer Don’t, but Roth punches up the idea with voiceover narration from Snoop Dogg.The faux trailer shows different characters repeatedly going into the house that Snoop is warning them not to go inside, where increasingly deranged horrors are unleashed upon them.
chinese_title: Don’t Go in That House, Bitch
